snippet: Reeling from the rising toll of gun violence, the city is expected to announce plans to hire perhaps more than 500 new officers....
abstract: Chicago Police Superintendent Eddie Johnson is expected to announce plans to hire more than 500 new police officers over and above current force; if approved, would be first major expansion of Chicago's Police Dept in years and signal shift in city's approach to dealing with major uptick in violence and homicides.
lead_paragraph: Reeling from the rising toll of gun violence, the city is expected to announce plans to hire perhaps more than 500 new officers.

headline.main: Chicago Is Planning to Add Hundreds of Police Officers
headline.print_headline: Police Force in Chicago May Grow by Over 500
